actions.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to require civil actions to be expedited, upon motion of a party who is 65 years of age or older.

summary.text: Requires any Federal court to: (1) expedite hearings on any civil matter if a party who is 65 years or older so requests; and (2) render a decision within one year after the date the action is brought. Specifies exceptions. Requires appeals or petitions for review to be expedited in the same manner.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to require civil actions to be expedited, upon motion of a party who is 65 years of age or older.
